publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3772 Ross Finnie: Congratulations to Clydebank Re-built on Awards for the Titan Craneâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Clydebank Re-built for winning the Civic Trust Award as well as the first Scotland Placemaking Civic Trust Award for the successful restoration of the A-listed Titan Crane, which towers over the old John Brown shipyard and has now been praised for its successful regeneration as a visitor attraction.
